actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution urging the United States and Canada to cooperate in their efforts to improve the quality of air in the boundary regions.

summary.text: Expresses the sentiment of the House of Representatives that (1) the Governments of the United States and Canada set up a bilateral task force under the International Joint Commission (established under the Boundary Waters Treaty) to conduct an evaluation of the desirability of a United States-Canadian clear air agreement to be submitted to the two Governments within nine months of the adoption of this resolution; and (2) the President take any diplomatic action necessary to reduce any undesirable impact on both countries from air pollution.

titles.title: A resolution urging the United States and Canada to cooperate in their efforts to improve the quality of air in the boundary regions.
